subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: As the Yankees prepare for next week’s wild-card showdown, fans will no doubt recall Dent’s heroics in a one-game playoff in 1978. But don’t forget about 1949.
snippet: As the Yankees prepare for next week’s wild-card showdown, fans will no doubt recall Dent’s heroics in a one-game playoff in 1978. But don’t forget about 1949.
